system.description: Stout and resilient, dwarves are known for their toughness and resistance to adversity. Their sturdy constitution makes them excellent warriors and craftsmen.

traits.name: Darksight
traits.description: You can see in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Sturdy
traits.description: You gain +1 to saves against Fear, Sickened, and Shove effects.
